TopicTitle: [Screenshot] A Rocket lifting off into Space (Desktop Background)

Articles.Content:
Title says it all! Hope you enjoy it! I took it myself, using Stock parts during a Liftoff of another (failed) Mun landing.

EDIT: I can\'t seem to attatch it. Here is a link, where you can RightClick>Set as Desktopbackground. http://i.imgur.com/dJhdP.png
Sorry, the Fan-Fiction board is not the place to dump your screenshots. Thread Locked.
